HPCStats

{%trans%} HPCStats is a software to help generate statistics about the usage of HPC supercomputers. {%endtrans%}

{%trans%} It imports data from various sources (job schedulers, user directories, etc) to build a coherent PostgreSQL database with all the information to extract usefull statistics about users, jobs and supercomputer availability. Read the {%endtrans%} {%trans%}introduction{%endtrans%} {%trans%}for more details.{%endtrans%}
